Image.Tag: What a green world! Have a look at the wrap in bamboo at the center of me. Just zoom in!
Hey! I just got a child seed! It's just on my head! Check it out by zoom in further!
So I'm a seed. But I'm already composed of multiple cells! Check out the largest cell on the top of my head!
Hi, I'm a cell. Good morning. But can check my DNA to make sure I'll grow up properly? It's in my core.
Hi, I'm DNA. Now let's play a game. Can you find a hidden molecular inside me? If you find it, you can go on to zoom in. :)
Nice catch! But do you think you're already at the end of your journey? No! Check out the largest atom inside me!
Well done! You're already at the atom level! But, if you move your mouse around, you will find a final secret~~.

Wow! You've caught me... I'm a neutron... OK. You've reached the end of your journey. Yes, I kow I'm made of multiple particles. But if you insist to zoom in further, you'll find yourself lost in the world of bosons and ferminons. :)
